attributes.description:
With VW Polokwane Master Cars we give our customers total peace of mind; every car is checked in our workshop by a qualified VW Technician and undergo a 80 point quality check . Everything that needs to be done is done to the vehicle before you take delivery. 

We are committed to making your purchase experience as easy as possible and are happy to take any trade-in, however old, organise finance for you and any of our other products that will help your ownership experience to be effortless.

Nation wide delivery
